result.execSummary:
The defendant Robert C Anderson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Dane County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes: DA has 90 days to prepare/submit order.  To be collected by the Department of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervision or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.
$243 to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.  $200 DNA surcharge remitted.

Maintain absolute sobriety.  Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with TC. Def shall not be at Mr. Roberts Bar in Madison, WI. Def shall not be in any business whose primary purpose is to sell alcohol.
Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.

timeConds.notes: W/ Huber. No huber if late to report. Credit does not apply.

miscConds.notes: $243 to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
All other conditions are the same as count 1.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert C Anderson

Final pre-trial on March 10, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Terry C.
- Defendant shall not be at Mr. Roberts Bar in Madison, WI.
- Defendant shall not consume alcohol.
- The court orders a signature bond in the amount of $500.00 per case on the condition that the defendant reports to, and complies with, Dane County Bail Monitoring (DCBM).  The defendant shall report to DCBM by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail. If defendant fails to comply with DCBM, cash bail is automatically set in the amount of $2,000.00 (per case), as higher cash bail is necessary to assure appearance in court. BMP is removed as condition of bond.
Trial Judge - Br 5

Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney  State Public Defender.  Kristin K. Shimabuku appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading.  Defendant stood mute.  Court entered not guilty plea as to any misdemeanor counts.  Final pre-trial scheduled for March 10, 2015 at 08:15 am.
